entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
